subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. is a Southern-style gentleman with a legion of fans. But while he is responsible for selling 25 percent of licensed products in the sport, Junior cannot win a race.
